# Reference

<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

### Classes

#### Public Classes

* [`pgprobackup`](#pgprobackup): Manages PostgreSQL backups using pg_probackup
* [`pgprobackup::catalog`](#pgprobackup--catalog): Manages host where backups are being stored
* [`pgprobackup::instance`](#pgprobackup--instance): Configure a DB instance

#### Private Classes

* `pgprobackup::grants`: Manages priviledges required for executing backup
* `pgprobackup::install`
* `pgprobackup::repo`
* `pgprobackup::repo::apt`
* `pgprobackup::repo::yum`

### Defined types

#### Private Defined types

* `pgprobackup::cron_backup`: A cron job is exported from a database instance, but could be executed elsewhere. Typically on a catalog (backup) server.

### Data types

* [`Pgprobackup::Backup_type`](#Pgprobackup--Backup_type): Supported backup types
* [`Pgprobackup::Config`](#Pgprobackup--Config): Backup schedule
* [`Pgprobackup::Hour`](#Pgprobackup--Hour)
* [`Pgprobackup::LogLevel`](#Pgprobackup--LogLevel): Supported log levels
* [`Pgprobackup::Minute`](#Pgprobackup--Minute)
* [`Pgprobackup::Month`](#Pgprobackup--Month)
* [`Pgprobackup::Monthday`](#Pgprobackup--Monthday)
* [`Pgprobackup::Weekday`](#Pgprobackup--Weekday)

## Classes

### <a name="pgprobackup"></a>`pgprobackup`

Manages PostgreSQL backups using pg_probackup

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include pgprobackup
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `pgprobackup` class:

* [`package_ensure`](#-pgprobackup--package_ensure)
* [`package_name`](#-pgprobackup--package_name)
* [`host_group`](#-pgprobackup--host_group)
* [`db_name`](#-pgprobackup--db_name)
* [`db_user`](#-pgprobackup--db_user)
* [`debug_symbols`](#-pgprobackup--debug_symbols)
* [`debug_suffix`](#-pgprobackup--debug_suffix)
* [`backup_dir`](#-pgprobackup--backup_dir)
* [`manage_ssh_keys`](#-pgprobackup--manage_ssh_keys)
* [`manage_host_keys`](#-pgprobackup--manage_host_keys)
* [`manage_pgpass`](#-pgprobackup--manage_pgpass)
* [`manage_hba`](#-pgprobackup--manage_hba)
* [`backup_user`](#-pgprobackup--backup_user)
* [`manage_cron`](#-pgprobackup--manage_cron)
* [`log_dir`](#-pgprobackup--log_dir)
* [`host_key_type`](#-pgprobackup--host_key_type)

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--package_ensure"></a>`package_ensure`

Data type: `String`

Ensure package installation

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--package_name"></a>`package_name`

Data type: `String`

Base package name, e.g. `pg_probackup`, `pg_probackup-std`, `pg_probackup-ent`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--host_group"></a>`host_group`

Data type: `String`

Allows grouping DB servers, each host_group should have just one backup catalog.

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--db_name"></a>`db_name`

Data type: `String`

Database created on DB instance

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--db_user"></a>`db_user`

Data type: `String`

PostgreSQL role used for connecting to DB instance/replication.

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--debug_symbols"></a>`debug_symbols`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to install package with debugging symbols, default: true

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--debug_suffix"></a>`debug_suffix`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Suffix for debug package

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--backup_dir"></a>`backup_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::AbsolutePath`

Path to backup catalog (physical backups storage)

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--manage_ssh_keys"></a>`manage_ssh_keys`

Data type: `Boolean`

When enabled public SSH key from backup catalog user will be
added as authorized key on DB instance

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--manage_host_keys"></a>`manage_host_keys`

Data type: `Boolean`

Adds host's ssh fingerprint to known hosts (required to negotiate ssh connection)

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--manage_pgpass"></a>`manage_pgpass`

Data type: `Boolean`

When true, configures password for database authentication (for backup role).

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--manage_hba"></a>`manage_hba`

Data type: `Boolean`

When enabled, create rule for connection from backup catalog server to DB instance.

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--backup_user"></a>`backup_user`

Data type: `String`



##### <a name="-pgprobackup--manage_cron"></a>`manage_cron`

Data type: `Boolean`



##### <a name="-pgprobackup--log_dir"></a>`log_dir`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::AbsolutePath]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--host_key_type"></a>`host_key_type`

Data type: `String`



### <a name="pgprobackup--catalog"></a>`pgprobackup::catalog`

Configures server for storing backups.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include pgprobackup::catalog
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `pgprobackup::catalog` class:

* [`backup_dir`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--backup_dir)
* [`user`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--user)
* [`group`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--group)
* [`dir_mode`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--dir_mode)
* [`manage_ssh_keys`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--manage_ssh_keys)
* [`host_group`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--host_group)
* [`purge_cron`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--purge_cron)
* [`log_dir`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--log_dir)
* [`logrotate_template`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--logrotate_template)
* [`exported_ipaddress`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--exported_ipaddress)
* [`user_ensure`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--user_ensure)
* [`user_shell`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--user_shell)
* [`manage_host_keys`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--manage_host_keys)
* [`manage_pgpass`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--manage_pgpass)
* [`manage_hba`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--manage_hba)
* [`manage_cron`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--manage_cron)
* [`uid`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--uid)
* [`hba_entry_order`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--hba_entry_order)
* [`ssh_key_fact`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--ssh_key_fact)
* [`package_name`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--package_name)
* [`package_ensure`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--package_ensure)
* [`versions`](#-pgprobackup--catalog--versions)

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--backup_dir"></a>`backup_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::AbsolutePath`

Directory for storing backups, also home directory for backup user

Default value: `$pgprobackup::backup_dir`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--user"></a>`user`

Data type: `String`

Local user account used for running and storing backups in its home dir.

Default value: `$pgprobackup::backup_user`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--group"></a>`group`

Data type: `String`

Primary group of backup user

Default value: `$pgprobackup::backup_user`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--dir_mode"></a>`dir_mode`

Data type: `String`

Permission mode for backup storage

Default value: `'0750'`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--manage_ssh_keys"></a>`manage_ssh_keys`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether ssh directory should be managed

Default value: `$pgprobackup::manage_ssh_keys`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--host_group"></a>`host_group`

Data type: `String`

Allows to import only certain servers

Default value: `$pgprobackup::host_group`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--purge_cron"></a>`purge_cron`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether remove unmanaged entries from crontab

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--log_dir"></a>`log_dir`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::AbsolutePath]`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::log_dir`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--logrotate_template"></a>`logrotate_template`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `'pgprobackup/logrotate.conf.erb'`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--exported_ipaddress"></a>`exported_ipaddress`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `"${facts['networking']['ip']}/32"`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--user_ensure"></a>`user_ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: `'present'`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--user_shell"></a>`user_shell`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `'/bin/bash'`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--manage_host_keys"></a>`manage_host_keys`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::manage_host_keys`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--manage_pgpass"></a>`manage_pgpass`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::manage_pgpass`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--manage_hba"></a>`manage_hba`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::manage_hba`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--manage_cron"></a>`manage_cron`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::manage_cron`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--uid"></a>`uid`

Data type: `Optional[Integer]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--hba_entry_order"></a>`hba_entry_order`

Data type: `Integer`



Default value: `50`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--ssh_key_fact"></a>`ssh_key_fact`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `$facts['pgprobackup_catalog_key']`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--package_name"></a>`package_name`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::package_name`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--package_ensure"></a>`package_ensure`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::package_ensure`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--catalog--versions"></a>`versions`

Data type: `Array[String]`



Default value: `['12']`

### <a name="pgprobackup--instance"></a>`pgprobackup::instance`

Prepares PostgreSQL host for running backups.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
pgprobackup::instance::backups:
  common:
    FULL:
      hour: 3
      minute: 15
      weekday: 0
    DELTA:
      hour: 0
      minute: 45
```

##### 

```puppet
include pgprobackup::instance
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `pgprobackup::instance` class:

* [`id`](#-pgprobackup--instance--id)
* [`cluster`](#-pgprobackup--instance--cluster)

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--id"></a>`id`

Data type: `String`

Unique identifier within `host_group`

Default value: `$facts['networking']['hostname']`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--cluster"></a>`cluster`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Could be used to group primary with standby servers

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--server_address"></a>`server_address`

Data type: `String`

Address used for connecting to the DB server

Default value: `$facts['networking']['fqdn']`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--server_port"></a>`server_port`

Data type: `Integer`

DB port

Default value: `5432`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--db_name"></a>`db_name`

Data type: `String`

Database used for backups

Default value: `$pgprobackup::db_name`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--db_user"></a>`db_user`

Data type: `String`

User connecting to database

Default value: `$pgprobackup::db_user`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--db_cluster"></a>`db_cluster`

Data type: `String`

Postgresql cluster e.g. `main`

Default value: `'main'`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--db_dir"></a>`db_dir`

Data type: `String`

PostgreSQL home directory

Default value: `'/var/lib/postgresql'`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--manage_dbuser"></a>`manage_dbuser`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether role for running backups should be managed.

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--version"></a>`version`

Data type: `String`

Major PostgreSQL release version for installing pg_probackup package

Default value: `lookup('postgresql::globals::version')`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--backups"></a>`backups`

Data type: `Optional[Pgprobackup::Config]`

Hash with backups schedule

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--retention_redundancy"></a>`retention_redundancy`

Data type: `Optional[Integer]`

The number of full backup copies to keep in the backup catalog.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--retention_window"></a>`retention_window`

Data type: `Optional[Integer]`

Defines the earliest point in time for which pg_probackup can complete the recovery.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--delete_expired"></a>`delete_expired`

Data type: `Boolean`

Delete expired backups when `retention_redundancy` or `retention_window` is set.

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--merge_expired"></a>`merge_expired`

Data type: `Boolean`

Merge expired backups when `retention_redundancy` or `retention_window` is set.

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--threads"></a>`threads`

Data type: `Optional[Integer]`

Number of parallel threads

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--temp_slot"></a>`temp_slot`

Data type: `Boolean`

Use temporary replication slot

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--slot"></a>`slot`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Replication slot name

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--validate"></a>`validate`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether backups should be validated after taking backup

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--compress_algorithm"></a>`compress_algorithm`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

Either `zlib`, `pglz` or `none` (default: `none`)

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--compress_level"></a>`compress_level`

Data type: `Integer`

Integer between 0 and 9 (default: `1`)

Default value: `1`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--archive_timeout"></a>`archive_timeout`

Data type: `Optional[Integer]`

Timeout in seconds for copying all remaining WAL files.

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--remote_user"></a>`remote_user`

Data type: `String`

user used for ssh connection to the DB instance

Default value: `'postgres'`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--remote_port"></a>`remote_port`

Data type: `Integer`

ssh port used for connection to the DB instance from catalog server

Default value: `22`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--binary"></a>`binary`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

custom script to be executed as backup command

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--redirect_console"></a>`redirect_console`

Data type: `Boolean`

Redirect console output to a log file (make sense especially with custom backup command)

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--log_console"></a>`log_console`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

File for storing console logs

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--log_rotation_size"></a>`log_rotation_size`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

rotate logfile if its size exceeds this value; 0 disables; (default: 0)
available units: 'kB', 'MB', 'GB', 'TB' (default: kB)

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--log_rotation_age"></a>`log_rotation_age`

Data type: `Optional[String]`

rotate logfile if its age exceeds this value; 0 disables; (default: 0)
available units: 'ms', 's', 'min', 'h', 'd' (default: min)

Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--db_password"></a>`db_password`

Data type: `Optional[Variant[String,Sensitive[String]]]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--seed"></a>`seed`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--manage_ssh_keys"></a>`manage_ssh_keys`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::manage_ssh_keys`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--manage_host_keys"></a>`manage_host_keys`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::manage_host_keys`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--manage_pgpass"></a>`manage_pgpass`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::manage_pgpass`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--manage_hba"></a>`manage_hba`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::manage_hba`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--manage_cron"></a>`manage_cron`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::manage_cron`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--manage_grants"></a>`manage_grants`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether grants needed for backups are managed, default true

Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--archive_wal"></a>`archive_wal`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--backup_dir"></a>`backup_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::AbsolutePath`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::backup_dir`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--backup_user"></a>`backup_user`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::backup_user`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--ssh_key_fact"></a>`ssh_key_fact`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `$facts['pgprobackup_instance_key']`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--log_dir"></a>`log_dir`

Data type: `Optional[Stdlib::AbsolutePath]`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::log_dir`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--log_file"></a>`log_file`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--log_level_file"></a>`log_level_file`

Data type: `Optional[Pgprobackup::LogLevel]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--log_level_console"></a>`log_level_console`

Data type: `Optional[Pgprobackup::LogLevel]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--package_name"></a>`package_name`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::package_name`

##### <a name="-pgprobackup--instance--package_ensure"></a>`package_ensure`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `$pgprobackup::package_ensure`

## Data types

### <a name="Pgprobackup--Backup_type"></a>`Pgprobackup::Backup_type`

Supported backup types

Alias of `Enum['FULL', 'DELTA']`

### <a name="Pgprobackup--Config"></a>`Pgprobackup::Config`

Backup schedule

Alias of

```puppet
Hash[String, Hash[
                                              Pgprobackup::Backup_type,Struct[{
                                                  Optional[hour]   => Pgprobackup::Hour,
                                                  Optional[minute] => Pgprobackup::Minute,
                                                  Optional[month]  => Pgprobackup::Month,
                                                  Optional[weekday] => Pgprobackup::Weekday,
                                                  Optional[monthday] => Pgprobackup::Monthday,
                                                  Optional[threads] => Integer,
                                                  Optional[retention_redundancy] => Integer,
                                                  Optional[retention_window] => Integer,
                                                  Optional[delete_expired] => Boolean,
                                                  Optional[merge_expired] => Boolean,
                                                  Optional[temp_slot] => Boolean,
                                                  Optional[slot] => String,
                                                  Optional[validate] => Boolean,
                                                  Optional[compress_algorithm] => String,
                                                  Optional[compress_level] => Integer,
                                                  Optional[archive_wal] => Boolean,
                                                  Optional[log_dir] => Stdlib::AbsolutePath,
                                                  Optional[log_file] => String,
                                                  Optional[log_console] => String,
                                                  Optional[log_rotation_size] => String,
                                                  Optional[log_rotation_age] => String,
                                                  Optional[redirect_console] => Boolean,
                                                  Optional[log_level_file] => Pgprobackup::LogLevel,
                                                  Optional[log_level_console] => Pgprobackup::LogLevel,
                                                }]
                                              ]]
```

### <a name="Pgprobackup--Hour"></a>`Pgprobackup::Hour`

The Pgprobackup::Hour data type.

Alias of `Variant[Integer[0,23], String, Tuple[Variant[String, Integer[0,23]], 1, default]]`

### <a name="Pgprobackup--LogLevel"></a>`Pgprobackup::LogLevel`

Supported log levels

Alias of `Enum['off', 'error', 'warning', 'info', 'log', 'verbose']`

### <a name="Pgprobackup--Minute"></a>`Pgprobackup::Minute`

The Pgprobackup::Minute data type.

Alias of `Variant[Integer[0,59], String, Tuple[Variant[String, Integer[0,59]], 1, default]]`

### <a name="Pgprobackup--Month"></a>`Pgprobackup::Month`

The Pgprobackup::Month data type.

Alias of `Variant[Integer[1,12], String, Tuple[Variant[String, Integer[1,12]], 1, default]]`

### <a name="Pgprobackup--Monthday"></a>`Pgprobackup::Monthday`

The Pgprobackup::Monthday data type.

Alias of `Variant[Integer[1,31], String, Tuple[Variant[String, Integer[1,31]], 1, default]]`

### <a name="Pgprobackup--Weekday"></a>`Pgprobackup::Weekday`

The Pgprobackup::Weekday data type.

Alias of `Variant[Integer[0,7], String, Tuple[Variant[String, Integer[0,7]], 1, default]]`
